sql-service.update: begin insert into con_contract_partner_lines( CONTRACT_HEADER_ID, CONTRACT_PARTNER_LINE_ID, PARTNER_CATEGORY, PARTNER_ID, BANK_BRANCH_CODE, BANK_ACCOUNT_CODE ) values( ${../../@contract_header_id}, con_contract_headers_s.NEXTVAL, ${@partner_category}, ${@partner_id}, ${@bank_branch_code}, ${@bank_account_code} ) returning CONTRACT_PARTNER_LINE_ID into ${@CONTRACT_PARTNER_LINE_ID}; end;
